metadata.name: Mega Satan in Greed Mode
metadata.description:
No more useless key pieces in Greed Mode! The Mega Satan door will now spawn after defeating Ultra Greed.
After defeating Mega Satan, a big chest, fresh donation machine, and golden penny will spawn.
To get key pieces from Devil Rooms, you can use either of these mods: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2732699827]Satan in Devil Rooms (+Fallen Angels)[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2897716537]Devil Keys[/url] [/list]
Mod Config Menu will give you the option to fight Mega Satan instead of Ultra Greed or Mega Satan after Ultra Greed. You can also choose to spawn a fool card after defeating Mega Satan.
Note: Don't skip Ultra Greed if you're trying to get your Greed Mode unlocks.
